plan_context.query:
You are a strict URL curator. Find the URL of current OFFICIAL pricing/help pages needed to extract CONSUMER “chatbot access” pricing for:
1) OpenAI ChatGPT (chatgpt.com)
2) Anthropic Claude (claude.ai)
3) xAI Grok (grok.com / help.x.com)

MAKE SURE THAT YOU ONLY RETURN WITH OFFICIAL PRICING PAGE OF CORRESPONDING CHATBOT LIKE OPENAI CHATGPT, ANTHROPIC CLAUDE, XAI GROK.

steps.task: Search for the official pricing page URL for OpenAI ChatGPT consumer chatbot access on chatgpt.com using a search query that targets the current official pricing information.
Search for the official pricing/help page URL for Anthropic Claude consumer chatbot access on claude.ai using a search query that targets the current official pricing information.
Search for the official pricing/help page URL for xAI Grok consumer chatbot access on grok.com using a search query that targets the current official pricing information.
Search for the official pricing/help page URL for xAI Grok consumer chatbot access on help.x.com using an alternate search query.

inputs.name: $grok_pricing_url_initial
inputs.description: Initial search result for xAI Grok from grok.com

steps.condition: if the result in $grok_pricing_url_initial is null or does not seem to be the official pricing/help page for xAI Grok

steps.task: Aggregate the official URLs for OpenAI ChatGPT, Anthropic Claude, and xAI Grok. Use the alternate xAI Grok URL from $grok_pricing_url_alternate if it exists, otherwise use $grok_pricing_url_initial.

inputs.name: $chatgpt_pricing_url
inputs.description: URL of the official pricing page for OpenAI ChatGPT from chatgpt.com

inputs.name: $claude_pricing_url
inputs.description: URL of the official pricing/help page for Anthropic Claude from claude.ai

inputs.name: $grok_pricing_url_initial
inputs.description: Initial URL result for xAI Grok from grok.com

inputs.name: $grok_pricing_url_alternate
inputs.description: Alternate URL result for xAI Grok from help.x.com if initial search did not return the official page
